document_data.name: Soulearth
document_data.mainbody: '''Soulearth''' was the cavernous [[divine realm]] of [[Urogalan]], the [[halfling]] [[deity]] of [[elemental earth]] and death.
document_data.Cosmography: In the [[Great Wheel cosmology]], this realm was located underground on [[Eronia]], the rugged and mountainous second layer of the [[plane]] known as [[Elysium]].
document_data.Inhabitants: Unlike the divine realms of the Halfling pantheon's other members, Soulearth lacked [[petitioner]]s of its own. Rather, the only creatures one could find there were the [[spirit]]s of halflings, which typically came to Soulearth upon their death and waited for Urogalan to assign them their proper place in the afterlife.
